revision.text: Possibly: An Account of the behaviour, and conduct, of Simon Lord Fraser, of Lovat, containing some particular memoirs of his life; likewise his trial at Westminster; his behaviour during his confinement in the Tower, and on the day of his execution. Also an extract of the letters which he sent to his son and the young pretender, &c. &c ([London? : s.n., 1747]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2250462~S5
